title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: People crying about urf and people crying about people crying about urf, which one is worse ?
You.
Draven Haters.
Your crying about people crying about people crying and now im crying about people crying about people.
11 am AEST... WELL FUCK sucks if your in new zealand. 1pm till we can start. shoulda just made it non stop so people dont gotta wait
100% this. RIOT dgaf bout us in NZ
they better not do this bs timing on urf weekend
so stupid aye! i woke up at 11am expecting to play only to find out i got to wait till 1, so stupid. it should be all day
So it only starts at 1 pm in NZ? I thought it was the same time for every region so 11am OCE
it says 11 am AEST.....
Yep what I was thinking - Australia isn't the only country in Oceania!! Come on RIOT - we count too!

Hey people at Riot running the OCE servers. 
I'm just curious about the reasoning behind having set times rather than just the whole weekend. As I am not a computer programmer and have no idea what running a server entails(as I am sure a large number of players aren't) is there a set reason why having them up the entire time during the weekend would negatively affect the system?
Does it cost more to keep these game modes open? 
Does it put too much strain on the system? 
I am assuming that it is not because you need people to monitor the system as it is running until 3 am in the morning. 
The money thing doesn't make much sense in that there are already 2 round the clock available maps with a total of 3 modes (normal blind, ranked and ARAM) as well as all the custom stuff.
If the issue is that you need a window to edit any problems that arise like bugs or glitches why not run the game mode for a period of time on the Friday and then make it 100% available to be played during the Saturday and Sunday. 
Due to our location as the first server to reach the weekend is our server kinda being used as a bug checker for the other servers? 
I believe the time allocation is not for preventing of enjoyment but for a particular reason, but unless that reason is explained the people complaining will be backed up rather than ignored or told to go read the article they are commenting on.

Also as I am sure you are aware there is going to be a LOT of unhappy players if the time limit thingy happens for URF

Thank you for your time, I look forward to an answer.

I'm fairly sure that they do it because weekends are generally the peak times for game activity because most people are free during then. That way the matchmaking system more accurate and it's much harder for a bronze to get matched up with a premade of golds or something like that

logged in just to comment saying the servers are really taking a beatting right now and this is causing people to get messages saying they are "unable to queue" after not being able to accept games, perhaps disabling this banning feature for these gamemodes would be a good idea, i mean really, who is going to not accept a fun gamemode like urf? .. or like the other ones i guess.
so.. no icon to win or something?
i would also like to know can we get icons or are they exclusive to the older players
They are exclusive to older players since it was a special event.
There's no icons linked to the rotating game modes. The icon you are referring to was for the Shurima event.

if we only have 2 times of URF that means we get a lot less urf then last year {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Honestly you guys are so f***ing thick. go look up the word rotate in the dictionary it means "pass to each member of a group in a regularly recurring order" like honestly this game isnt about urf if you love it that goddamn much become a programmer, make your own game and stfu its riots game they can do whatever they goddamn want

also YAY ASCENSION <3

we all spend money on this game and with out players they wouldn't even be here. so when most of the player base wants a game mode and riot keep being dicks about it, i feel like we have a right to say something about it. 2 days after having to wait though two really bad game modes is not enough time to have fun in urf.

also screw your Ascension

Let me explain the laws of a repetitive game experience to you... If you eat an apple, it's good. It's tasty. You like apples. You'll eat them every so often. But if it was the only meal you ever ate it'd become boring really quick and you'd lose interest. Riot addressed this and actually told use why there wouldn't be a permanent urf mode.

So tell me this. If you got to play urf mode every day you wanted, wouldn't you get bored with it? The magic just wouldn't be there!

Last note! If it WAS a permanent gamemode, then it would no doubt harm the overall status of the game as a competitive scene. There would be a split in the community, and it would turn from a magical experience to another cesspit of hate and sadness.

Riot chose to do rotations because they knot that it's what we as gamers will benefit the most from! We will cherish these fun and exciting gamemodes if we only have a limited time frame to play each of them, and we will eagerly wait for our favorite routine.

Or would you rather wait for April fools every year? That's predictable and too infrequent.

This system is perfect for our community.

Having it permanent would be a problem, but for two weeks a year starting April fools is way better than rotation. For one people who work like me have to work weekends ,so we would miss the whole rotation unless we decided to deprive our self of sleep or call off. Been predictable  is not bad, it allow people to prepare  plus it was made to celebrate the holiday. Holidays come one time a year every year.

Really riot? You make the gamemodes start at 1pm and make them end at 5am?!?!? (I live in NZ) That's just unfair if I want to play URF the whole weekend, but I can't. It's just sad. Espeicaly when I do most of my weekend gaming in the morning, I will only get to play URF friday afterschool. You should make it at least last all day for everyone so wwe can all play.
Sigh .. This game is just all about making money now.. Solo queue removed intro of dynamic queue, Hextech crafting. Lol has becoming a shit game. I remember how much fun I used to have in s4
Can we just play these in custom games? :\
MAKE ASCENSION PERMANENT

Is there a Rioter that can answer why Taric was released in 2009.. and has 3 skins. Tahm Kench was released in 2015... and has 3 skins. That a 6 year difference. It just feels like Taric isn't getting the love he deserves. As a Taric player this is truly outrageous.
Why riot, no one asked for this{{item:3070}}
riot wtf happened to ascension???? like i played it once than it was gone for some reason and its only in custom and it doesnt even work!! i loved it and im just wondering wat happened {{item:3070}}

wow... Only 2 days of URF... RIP Riot for being such snobs with the Rotations... Waited for URF for like a whole year... And didn't get it. Now only have URF for 2-3 days? Even when Rotations in effect... Who cares... It was way better back then.
But you would get urf more often in the year?
no back in the day you would get 14days of urf. now we get it twice a year for 3 days each, thats 6days

I wish they would make the gamemodes active before 11am AEST. For me personally, 90% of my free game time would be before this time, and I am simply unable to play much of these gamemodes because of this. What makes it worse is the fact that I live in New Zealand, so really these gamemodes don't become active until 1pm for me, seriously limiting how much I am able to play these gamemodes. 

It just seems like there would be more people wanting to play from 9-11am, than there would be wanting to play from 1am to 3am?? I would really appreciate it (and I'm sure a lot of others would too)if they either shifted the period of time these gamemodes are up back a few hours, or simply extended the overall peiods that they are live. 

I understand that riot doesn't want the queue times to be too long for these gamemodes at unusual hours, however some of us don't mind waiting a bit longer for these special gamemodes. It's better than not being able to play at all!
